thread.section_title: ADS Sports Eyewear Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of ADS Sports Eyewear | adseyewear.com
thread.title: Russell Pfund
thread.title_full: ADS Sports Eyewear reviewed by Russell Pfund

author: Russell Pfund
title: Russell Pfund
text: If you are offered a discount make sure you ask what the discount is applied to. I was disappointed to find out that it only applied to a portion of my total... However, I learned later that the additional monies was refunded. I couldn't have been more pleased. Thanks Adseyeware...
